title: ILoveQatar . net | Things to do in Doha : 21 - 27 September 2025
body_text:
Looking for cool events to check out in Qatar? From football matches and inspiring forums to art exhibitions, fun hangouts, and dance nights, there’s plenty happening around town. Here’s a list of exciting events you don’t want to miss!
For more events around you, visit iloveqatar.net/events!
26 September 2025
Dragon Boat Regatta Qatar 2025 - Leg 2
Get ready for the Dragon Boat Regatta Qatar 2025 – Leg 2 on September 26! Whether you’re watching, cheering, or joining a community team, everyone’s welcome. Full training is provided, and participation comes with a minimal fee. More thrilling events follow in October and November!
Details
- Location: Lusail Marina Corniche, Qatar
- Date: 26 September 2025
- Time: 5 am - 11:30 am
- Price: Come and watch- it's free!
- Website: Click Here
27 September 2025
Register for Doha Women Forum 2025
The 8th Doha Women Forum unites women leaders, visionaries, and changemakers to celebrate the transformative power of women’s voices. Centered on the theme “Voices of Change,” this year’s forum explores Education, Leadership, Health, and Global Mobility, highlighting how women are shaping a more inclusive and empowered world.
Details
- Location: Grand Hyatt Doha
- Date: 27 September 2025
- Time: 10 am - 4 pm
- Price: Register online - QR 350
- Website: Click Here
25 September - 4 October 2025
360 AllStars Live at Mall of Qatar
For the first time in Qatar! Get ready for 10 days of pure adrenaline with 360 AllStars, LIVE at Mall of Qatar from 25 September – 4 October 2025.
Witness a jaw-dropping mix of BMX stunts, Basketball freestyle, Breakdancing, Cyr wheel, Beatbox & Drums. Bring your family and friends for a show like no other!
Details
- Location: Oasis Stage
- Date: 25 September - 4 October 2025
- Time: 6 pm, 7:15 pm, 8:30 pm
- Price: It's free!
- Website: Click Here
21 September 2025
AGCFF U-17 Gulf Cup Qatar 2025: Qatar vs Yemen
From 20 September to 3 October 2025, Qatar will host the region’s emerging football talents in an exciting battle for glory - the inaugural edition under the Arab Gulf Cup Football Federation! Qatar will go up against Yemen on 21 September 2025 at Grand Hamad (Al Arabi Stadium).
Details
- Location: Grand Hamad (Al Arabi Stadium)
- Date: 21 September 2025
- Time: 6 pm onwards
- Email: tickets@qfa.qa
- Price: QR 10
- Website: Click Here
24 September 2025
AGCFF U-17 Gulf Cup Qatar 2025: Oman vs Qatar
Qatar takes on Oman on 24 September 2025 at Grand Hamad (Al Arabi Stadium). Get your tickets and catch all the action in this exciting clash!
Details
- Location: Grand Hamad (Al Arabi Stadium) Qatar
- Date: 24 September 2025
- Time: 8 pm onwards
- Email: tickets@qfa.qa
- Price: QR 10
- Website: Click Here
Until 25 September 2025
Sustainable Interactive Pavilion at Doha Festival City
On the occasion of World Cleanup Day, the Ministry of Municipality invites you to visit the Sustainable Interactive Booth. Enjoy interactive activities, competitions, gifts, and awareness sessions!
Details
- Location: Doha Festival City
- Date: Until 25 September 2025
- Time: 9 am - 9 pm
- Price: General entry - It's free!
- Website: Click Here
1 - 30 September 2025
Live Art Exhibition at Katara 21 High Street
Step into a world where art comes alive! Watch talented artists transform blank canvases into masterpieces right before your eyes. Join and be part of the experience! An inspiring evening of culture, creativity, and beauty awaits you at 21 High St. – Katara.
Details
- Location: 21 High Street in Katara
- Date: 1 - 30 September 2025
- Time: Every Thursday, Friday and Saturday in September: 6 pm - 10 pm
- Price: Check it out - It's free!
- Website: Click Here
10 August - 2 October 2025
Doha Photography Award 2025
The Doha Photography Award is a testament to Qatar's vibrant role in the creative arts, with a special focus on highlighting the art of photography. Photographers of all ages and experience levels are welcome to participate. Participation in the award is free.
Submission deadline: 2 October 2025 at 7 pm.
Details
- Location: Doha, Qatar
- Date: 10 August - 2 October 2025
- Time: 4 pm - 6 pm
- Price: Submit your entry now! - It's free!
- Website: Click here
Until 8 November 2025
Cures, Remedies, and Recipes: Treasures of MIA Library
The MIA Library is set to unveil a fascinating rare book display, Cures, Remedies, and Recipes: Medical Manuscripts in the MIA Library. The exhibition delves into historical approaches to medicine, healing, and wellness, featuring a curated selection of rare books and manuscripts, including never-before-seen works from the esteemed MIA Gastronomy Collection.
Details
- Location: Museum of Islamic Art Library
- Date: Until 8 November 2025
- Time:
- Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday: 9 am - 7 pm
- Wednesday: Closed
- Friday: 1:30 pm - 7 pm
- Price:
- Residents - It's free!
- Adult non-resident - QR 50
- Student non-resident - QR 25
- Website: Click here
Until 8 November 2025
A Seat at the Table: Food & Feasting in the Islamic World Exhibition
This exhibition explores culinary traditions from the rise of Islam to today, highlighting historical shifts, the impact of trade on food, and the role of dining etiquette in courtly culture. It will showcase over 100 objects across five sections, each featuring a video of a contemporary chef preparing a culturally significant dish.
Details
- Location: Museum of Islamic Art
- Date: Until 8 November 2025
- Time: 9 am - 6 pm
- Price:
- Adult Resident - It's free!
- Adult Non-resident - 50QR
- Child (Age 16 and under) - It's free!
- Student Resident - It's free!
- Student Non-resident - 25QR
- Website: Click Here
Until 4 December 2025
Memememememe Exhibition
Visit the Media Majlis Museum this Fall 2025 to explore the power of memes in reshaping communication. Discover how memes travel, evolve, and influence culture, politics, and society, while examining their reach, longevity, and impact in a thought-provoking, immersive exhibition.
Details
- Location: Main exhibition space, Media Majlis Museum
- Date: 1 September - 4 December 2025
- Timing: Sunday to Thursday from 10 am - 8 pm
- Price: Open to public - it's free!
- Website: Click Here
Until 20 December 2025
Escape Room: The Banquet of Secrets
Experience Qatar’s first museum escape room! Explore interconnected chambers themed around the Islamic Traveller, Cook, Physician, and Calligrapher, uncovering hidden knowledge and quests to unlock the Sultan’s secret banquet.
Details
- Location: Museum of Islamic Art
- Date: Until 20 December 2025
- Time: Every Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday at 3 pm, 4:30 pm & 6 pm respectively
- Price: Register now - It's free!
- Website: Click Here
Until 31 December 2025
Bailamos Salsa and Latino Night at Tahitian Village
Spice up your Wednesdays with Bailamos Salsa & Latino Night at Tahitian Village! Enjoy an electrifying Latino atmosphere with live Cuban music, dancing to Salsa, Bachata, Kizomba, Reggaetón, and Pop Latino.
Details
- Location: Tahitian Village, Hilton Doha
- Date: Until 31 December 2025
- Time: 9 pm - 2 am
- Price: Free entry!
- Wesbite: Click Here
Until 31 December 2025
Karting at Lusail Circuit
Time to go go-karting at the Lusail International Circuit. The karting track is approximately 900m in length, with around 15 karts on track running 12-minute session times, and is open to the public.
Details
- Location: Lusail International Circuit
- Date: Wednesdays to Saturdays until 31 December 2025
- Time: 6 pm - 11 pm
- Price: QR 125 per session
- Website: Click Here
Which one are you looking forward to? Let us know in the comment section and share this article - it keeps us going!
